TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Object with effective date time end in the past.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability to process MIP4 objects with effective date time end in the past.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer receives MIP4 objects with effective date time end in the past and processes them into their system.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S, File
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Validated means to acquire information from the Producer using a MIP4 exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The consumer can process MIP4 objects with effective date time end in the past.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Consumer successfully acquires content from the Producer and is able to apply it to their system without error.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain a MIP4 Object with effective date time end in the past, from the producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content will be received from the Producer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Process all the MIP4 content on the Consumer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Consumer will successfully process the MIP4 content without error, and indicates if it is applicable or not to the Current Situation.
